name: Space Blaster (RebornIllu)
description:
Changes planned:

- Actually add instructions lol

- Create a total of 8 levels for the game at minimum.

- Make a final boss enemy and give it its own level

- Change some of the music

- Create a new asteroid obstacle for the player to dodge

- UI updates (add life count, enemies left/kills needed)

- Maybe also more stuff that I'm not confident I can do but still want to (Speedrun/timed mode, arrow pointing to the last enemy, collectable lives or coins, new art, etc.)
